p: All the experiments were carried out in quadrant. Zones of inhibition were analyzed using Statistical Package for Social Sciences, version 16.0 (SPSS, Chicago, IL, USA). Other data were subjected to T-test for comparison, while those recorded from disc diffusion tests were analyzed using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) with multiple comparison tests to compare the mean ± standard deviation parameter within and between groups which were considered statistically significant at p < 0.05.
